page.title: 09THE LIBRARY, BOURNE
page.content: To study{recreation}in Bourne, two members of Westfield School went to { {Bourne Library}in South Street. The library is open for seven hours each day, except Saturday when it is open for three hours. On Wednesday and Sunday the library is closed. The busiest days of the week are Tuesdays and Saturdays. Before the library was built twenty years ago the area was a field. The most popular books are novels. When you come through the door you can see the desk which is on the left. To the right there is a children's room. The study room has a photocopier. You can choose up to six books. They are stamped in a machine and you can keep them for up to twentyfour days. The library holds activities for children during the summer holidays.
